尗字的基本解释

尗
shú
同“菽”。

尗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shū］
［《廣韻》式竹切，入屋，書。］
(1)“菽”的古字。
(2)同“叔”。

尗字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【小字部】　尗； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页297第05
【正字通】菽叔同。【前漢·昭帝紀】以叔粟當賦。【註】與菽同。又叔，季父也。古作尗，从上，从小。後人加又爲叔。或从寸作?。又加艸爲菽。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shū］
["Guangyun" style bamboo cut, enter the house, book. ]
(1) The ancient character of "菽".
(2) Same as "Uncle".
尗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Small Character Department】　尗; Kangxi strokes: 6; Page number: page 297 05
【Zhengzitong】Uncle Shu is the same. [Pre-Han · Zhaodi Ji] Shusu was used as a fu. 【Note】Same as Shu. Uncle again, father Ji. Ancient works, from the top, since childhood. Later, he became uncle again. Or from the inch?. Also add 艸 as Sunn.
